name: todo_write
description:
Manage your task list. Use 'add' to append new items, 'update' to change an item's status or content, 'remove' to delete an item, 'replace' to overwrite the full list.

Task states:
- pending: Not started yet
- in_progress: Currently working on (only ONE at a time)
- completed: Finished successfully

IMPORTANT:
- Use 'add' to build the list incrementally
- Use 'update' with an index to change status
- Indices are shown in [CURRENT TODO STATE] context

action.description: Operation: 'add' appends items, 'update' changes an item by index, 'remove' deletes an item by index, 'replace' overwrites the full list

todos.description: Items to add or replace (for 'add' and 'replace' actions)

target_tier.description: Which tier should execute this todo. Omit for self-directed tasks.

index.description: Item index for 'update' and 'remove' actions (shown in todo state as [0], [1], etc.)
